title: 97/236/EC: Commission Decision of 13 March 1997 authorizing the grant by Finland of national aid in the reindeer sector (Only the Finnish and Swedish texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 13 March 1997 authorizing the grant by Finland of national aid in the reindeer sector (Only the Finnish and Swedish texts are authentic) (97/236/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The aid measures in the reindeer sector notified by Finland in its letter of 8 July 1996, as amended by letter dated 24 October 1996, are hereby authorized.
The Finnish authorities shall send the Commission each year information enabling the Commission to establish whether the traditional levels of production have been complied with.
This Decision is addressed to the Republic of Finland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 March 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 151, 30. 6. 1968, p. 16.
(2) OJ No L 26, 2. 2. 1996, p. 13.
